```{r}


# Multiple lines
line_1 = cbind(longitude[1:5], latitude[1:5])
line_2 = cbind(longitude[6:10], latitude[6:10])
comb_line = list(line_1, line_2)
m_lines = st_multilinestring(comb_line)

# Mulitple points
mpoints = cbind(longitude, latitude)
mpoints = st_multipoint(mpoints)


# A point

one_point = cbind(longitude[1], latitude[1])
one_point = st_point(one_point)

allgeom = list(one_point, mpoints, m_lines)

plot(st_geometrycollection(allgeom))

```

```{r}
char = "x"
vowels = c("a","e","i", "o", "u")

if(char %in% vowels){
  cat({char}, 'is a vowel') 
} else{
  cat({char}, 'is a consonant')
}

```
```{r}
num = 3

if(num > 0){
  cat({num}, 'is a positive') 
} else if(num == 0){
  cat({num}, 'is a Zero') 
} else{
  cat({num}, 'is a negative') 
}
```
```{r}
year = 2000

if((year %% 4 == 0 && year %% 100 != 0) | year %% 400 == 0){
  cat({year}, 'is a Leap Year') 
} else{
  cat({year}, 'is not a Leap Year') 
}


year = 2000

if ((year %% 4 == 0 && year %% 100 != 0) || year %% 400 == 0) {
  cat(year, 'is a Leap Year') 
} else {
  cat(year, 'is not a Leap Year') 
}

```
